Function Documentation

int vqec_cli_loop_wrapper ( uint16_t  cli_port,
in_addr_t  cli_if_addr 
)

Creates a telnet socket listening to the <cli_port> and then loops waiting to receive cli commands on that port. Only VQEC_CLI_CLIENT_MAX clients are accepted.

Parameters:
[in] cli_port - specifies telnet port for the cli. note specifying a cli_port of zero does not start a telnet server.
[in] cli_if_addr - specifies the interface address to bind the telnet server to. note specifying a cli_if_addr of zero binds the server to listen on all interfaces.
Returns:
0 if the loop exits normally, 1 if the loop exited because the telnet server failed to start.
CLI telnet session. See vqec_cli_loop.

void* vqec_cli_startup ( void   ) 

Initialize VQEC's CLI.

Returns:
A cli_handle, for use in starting an optional CLI telnet session. See vqec_cli_loop.

void vqec_destroy_cli ( void   )
